summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 8.8°C), outside temperature (down 8.6°C), and inside temperature (down 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 6280 lux) and cloud levels (up 318 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 10658 lux), and cloud levels (up 204 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, low humidity will be noticeable and gentle light winds are expected. Chance of light rain, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and periods of sunshine are expected. Similar weather conditions should remain.
